Details

Dates & Times August 7th to 11th - 9:00am to 12:30pm
Duration 5-day camp, 3.5 hours each day
Ages 8 - 10 years old
Skill Level Beginners / Intermediate
Location Taman Zaaba, TTDI
Price RM 999 (Early bird price: RM799)

What is this camp about?

Minecraft, a video game about building blocks, is one of the best selling video games of all time and the ultimate platform to showcase your creativity.

In learning Java programming and technical concepts behind video game modding, this course will empower students with the ability to go into the code and modify video games. That is just the tip of the iceberg of what we can achieve!

Android smart phones, company infrastructures—not to mention Minecraft—all begin with a variable coded in Java.

Session breakdown

  • Create and setup the main file for Mods
  • Understand the various components in Minecraft Forge and Java
  • Manipulate objects using variables and functions
  • Design and create your own Minecraft items & blocks
  • Manipulate new recipes for crafting and smelting

Takeaways

Theoretical / Conceptual:
  • Students will learn to use Java variables, functions, and control structures.
  • Understand the process of game making
Technical or Software skills:
  • Manipulate and design objects with Java and Minecraft Forge
  • Importing 2D designs into Minecraft
  • Understand the various components of Minecraft
Tangible and/or Portfolio Outcomes:
  • A collection of self created items and blocks in Minecraft
  • Their own Minecraft world to showcase it on their computer
  • Students will go home with their Mod Workspace and a mod .jar file.

Featured Software

  • Minecraft | Java™ (Eclipse®)

Highlights

  • Thought by Ivy League Graduates
  • All our students are taught by Dr Ewe himself being the lead instructor.
  • Hands-on Project-based Learning.
  • We believe in hands-on creation, experimental learning and lots of discussion.
  • We believe in collaborative self-pace learning, guided & coached by passionate and experience great people.

Requirements

  • Classes conducted in English and elementary reading level requirement
  • Bring your own laptop (PC, Linux or Mac), power supply and mouse
  • Must have played Minecraft on a laptop (not just Ipad edition) for 10 hours or more :D

“We see the whole Java code that NOTCH (the creator) wrote. We modify it and create our own things in Minecraft..!”

Amanda, 10 years old
